jodd.chalk

Class Chalk<T extends Chalk<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.chalk.Chalk<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Chalk256

    public class Chalk<T extends Chalk<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Chalk allows you to color output going to console.
    See Also:
    Chalk256
